hadiths.text: Narrated Rafi` bin Khadij:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Eat what is slaughtered (with any instrument) that makes blood flow out, except what is slaughtered with a tooth or a nail

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يُذَكَّى بِالسِّنِّ وَالْعَظْمِ وَالظُّفُرِ
chapter.eng-name: Not to slaughter with a tooth, a bone or a nail
